verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> Furthermore David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to the entire הַקָּהָ֔ל <S%H6951><s%> unto all the congregation שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> my son אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> whom alone בָּֽחַר־ <S%H977><s%> hath chosen בּ֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> [is yet] young וָרָ֑ךְ <S%H7390><s%> and tender וְהַמְּלָאכָ֣ה <S%H4399><s%> and the work גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> [is] great כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> for לְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> [is] not for man הַבִּירָ֔ה <S%H1002><s%> for the palace כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> but for the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וּֽכְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֹּחִ֞י <S%H3581><s%> with all my might הֲכִינ֣וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> Now I have prepared לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> for the house אֱלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> of my God הַזָּהָ֣ב ׀ <S%H2091><s%> the gold לַ֠זָּהָב <S%H2091><s%> for [things to be made] of gold וְהַכֶּ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and the silver לַכֶּ֜סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for [things] of silver וְהַנְּחֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and the brass לַנְּחֹ֗שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> for [things] of brass הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> the iron לַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> for [things] of iron וְהָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> and wood לָעֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> for [things] of wood אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones שֹׁ֨הַם <S%H7718><s%> onyx וּמִלּוּאִ֜ים <S%H4394><s%> and [stones] to be set אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones פ֣וּךְ <S%H6320><s%> glistering וְרִקְמָ֗ה <S%H7553><s%> and of divers colours וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶ֧בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָ֛ה <S%H3368><s%> and all manner of precious וְאַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones שַׁ֖יִשׁ <S%H7893><s%> and marble לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> in abundance

וְע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Moreover בִּרְצוֹתִי֙ <S%H7521><s%> Moreover because I have set my affection בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֱלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> of my God יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> I have לִ֥י סְגֻלָּ֖ה <S%H5459><s%> of mine own proper good זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וָכָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> [which] I have given לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֱלֹהַי֙ <S%H430><s%> of my God לְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> over and above מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> all that I have prepared לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> for the holy

שְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> [Even] three אֲלָפִ֛ים <S%H505><s%> thousand כִּכְּרֵ֥י <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold מִזְּהַ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> of the gold אוֹפִ֑יר <S%H211><s%> of Ophir וְשִׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֲלָפִ֤ים <S%H505><s%> thousand כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> silver מְזֻקָּ֔ק <S%H2212><s%> of refined לָט֖וּחַ <S%H2902><s%> to overlay קִיר֥וֹת <S%H7023><s%> the walls הַבָּתִּֽים׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the houses

לַזָּהָ֤ב <S%H2091><s%> The gold לַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> for [things] of gold וְלַכֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and the silver לַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for [things] of silver וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> is for all מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> and for all manner of work בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> [to be made] by the hands חָרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2796><s%> of artificers וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who מִתְנַדֵּ֔ב <S%H5068><s%> And who [then] is willing לְמַלֹּ֥אות <S%H4390><s%> to consecrate יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his service הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah

וַיִּֽתְנַדְּבוּ֩ <S%H5068><s%> offered willingly שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> Then the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י ׀ <S%H8269><s%> and princes שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> and of hundreds וּלְשָׂרֵ֖י <S%H8269><s%> with the rulers מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> work הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

וַֽיִּתְּנ֞וּ <S%H5414><s%> And gave לַעֲבוֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God זָהָ֞ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold כִּכָּרִ֣ים <S%H3603><s%> talents חֲמֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H2568><s%> five אֲלָפִים֮ <S%H505><s%> thousand וַאֲדַרְכֹנִ֣ים <S%H150><s%> drams רִבּוֹ֒ <S%H7239><s%> and ten thousand וְכֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and of silver כִּכָּרִים֙ <S%H3603><s%> talents עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וּנְחֹ֕שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and of brass רִבּ֛וֹ <S%H7239><s%> myriad וּשְׁמוֹנַ֥ת <S%H8083><s%> eight אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand כִּכָּרִ֑ים <S%H3603><s%> talents וּבַרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron מֵֽאָה־ <S%H3967><s%> and one hundred אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand כִּכָּרִֽים׃ <S%H3603><s%> talents

וְהַנִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> were found אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> for אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> And they with whom [precious] stones נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave לְאוֹצַ֣ר <S%H214><s%> [them] to the treasure בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> in יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand יְחִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3171><s%> of Jehiel הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּֽי׃ <S%H1649><s%> the Gershonite

וַיִּשְׂמְח֤וּ <S%H8055><s%> rejoiced הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> Then the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הִֽתְנַדְּבָ֔ם <S%H5068><s%> for that they offered willingly כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8003><s%> because with perfect הִֽתְנַדְּב֖וּ <S%H5068><s%> they offered willingly לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> also דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> and David הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king שָׂמַ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> also rejoiced שִׂמְחָ֥ה <S%H8057><s%> joy גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> with great פ

וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Wherefore David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> all the congregation וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> and David בָּר֨וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] thou LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our father מֵעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> and ever

לְךָ֣ יְ֠הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God הַגְּדֻלָּ֨ה <S%H1420><s%> [is] the greatness וְהַגְּבוּרָ֤ה <S%H1369><s%> and the power וְהַתִּפְאֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H8597><s%> and the glory וְהַנֵּ֣צַח <S%H5331><s%> and the victory וְהַה֔וֹד <S%H1935><s%> and the majesty כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed כֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> everything בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> for all [that is] in the heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in the earth לְךָ֤ יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God הַמַּמְלָכָ֔ה <S%H4467><s%> [is thine] thine [is] the kingdom וְהַמִּתְנַשֵּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> exalt לְכֹ֥ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> as head

וְהָעֹ֤שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> Both riches וְהַכָּבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> and honour מִלְּפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> [come] of thee וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> and You מוֹשֵׁ֣ל <S%H4910><s%> and thou reignest בַּכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> all וּבְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> over all and in thine hand כֹּ֣חַ <S%H3581><s%> [is] power וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <S%H1369><s%> and might וּבְיָ֣דְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> and in thine hand לְגַדֵּ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> [it is] to make great וּלְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> and to give strength לַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> everyone

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> Now therefore our God מוֹדִ֥ים <S%H3034><s%> we thank אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves לָ֑ךְ וּֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <S%H1984><s%> thee and praise לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name תִּפְאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H8597><s%> thy glorious

וְכִ֨י <S%H3588><s%> But מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> But who [am] I and what [is] my people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> should נַעְצֹ֣ר <S%H6113><s%> that we should be כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> able לְהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <S%H5068><s%> to offer so willingly כָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִמְּךָ֣ <S%H4480><s%> at הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> things וּמִיָּדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> after this sort? for all things [come] of thee and of thine own נָתַ֥נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> have we given לָֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֵרִ֨ים <S%H1616><s%> For we [are] strangers אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we לְפָנֶ֛יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְתוֹשָׁבִ֖ים <S%H8453><s%> thee and sojourners כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> as [were] all our fathers כַּצֵּ֧ל ׀ <S%H6738><s%> [are] as a shadow יָמֵ֛ינוּ <S%H3117><s%> our days עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> on the earth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מִקְוֶֽה׃ <S%H4723><s%> and [there is] none abiding

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God כֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all הֶהָמ֤וֹן <S%H1995><s%> all this store הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> we הֲכִינֹ֔נוּ <S%H3559><s%> that we have prepared לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> to build לְךָ֥ בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> thee an house לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H6944><s%> for thine holy מִיָּדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> [cometh] of thine hand [הִיא כ] (ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ק) וּלְךָ֥ הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> and all

וְיָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know אֱלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> also my God כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you בֹּחֵ֣ן <S%H974><s%> that thou triest לֵבָ֔ב <S%H3824><s%> the heart וּמֵישָׁרִ֖ים <S%H4339><s%> As for me in the uprightness תִּרְצֶ֑ה <S%H7521><s%> and hast pleasure אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I בְּיֹ֤שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> in uprightness לְבָבִי֙ <S%H3824><s%> of mine heart הִתְנַדַּ֣בְתִּי <S%H5068><s%> I have willingly offered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> thy people הַנִּמְצְאוּ־ <S%H4672><s%> which are present פֹ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> here רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> all these things and now have I seen בְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <S%H8057><s%> with joy לְהִֽתְנַדֶּב־ <S%H5068><s%> here to offer willingly לָֽךְ׃

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱ֠לֹהֵי <S%H430><s%> God אַבְרָהָ֞ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham יִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and of Israel אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our fathers שֳׁמְרָה־ <S%H8104><s%> keep זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> this for ever לְיֵ֥צֶר <S%H3336><s%> in the imagination מַחְשְׁב֖וֹת <S%H4284><s%> of the thoughts לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> of the heart עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people וְהָכֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> and prepare לְבָבָ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> their heart אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> unto Solomon בְנִ֗י <S%H1121><s%> my son תֵּ֚ן <S%H5414><s%> And give לֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> heart שָׁלֵ֔ם <S%H8003><s%> a perfect לִשְׁמוֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> to keep מִצְוֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H4687><s%> thy commandments עֵדְוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H5715><s%> thy testimonies וְחֻקֶּ֑יךָ <S%H2708><s%> appointed וְלַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to do הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> all וְלִבְנ֖וֹת <S%H1129><s%> all [these things] and to build הַבִּירָ֥ה <S%H1002><s%> the palace אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֲכִינֽוֹתִי׃ <S%H3559><s%> [for] the which I have made provision פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַקָּהָ֔ל <S%H6951><s%> to all the congregation בָּֽרְכוּ־ <S%H1288><s%> Now bless נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> Now אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וַיְבָרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> blessed כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּהָ֗ל <S%H6951><s%> And all the congregation לַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹֽתֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וַיִּקְּד֧וּ <S%H6915><s%> and bowed down their heads וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> and the king

וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ <S%H2076><s%> And they sacrificed לַיהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD זְ֠בָחִים <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> and offered עֹל֜וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְֽמָחֳרַת֮ <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> after that day הַהוּא֒ <S%H1931><s%> he פָּרִ֨ים <S%H6499><s%> bullocks אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> [even] a thousand אֵילִ֥ים <S%H352><s%> rams אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand כְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> [and] a thousand וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H5262><s%> with their drink offerings וּזְבָחִ֥ים <S%H2077><s%> and sacrifices לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel

וַיֹּאכְל֨וּ <S%H398><s%> And did eat וַיִּשְׁתּ֜וּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּשִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> gladness גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> with great וַיַּמְלִ֤יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> king שֵׁנִית֙ <S%H8145><s%> the second time לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> And they made Solomon בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְשְׁח֧וּ <S%H4886><s%> and anointed לַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [him] unto the LORD לְנָגִ֥יד <S%H5057><s%> [to be] the chief governor וּלְצָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> [to be] priest

וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> sat on שְׁ֠לֹמֹה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֨א <S%H3678><s%> the throne יְהוָ֧ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְמֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> as king תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> instead דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> instead of David אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיַּצְלַ֑ח <S%H6743><s%> and prospered וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> obeyed אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> And all the princes וְהַגִּבֹּרִ֔ים <S%H1368><s%> and the mighty men וְגַ֕ם <S%H1571><s%> and also כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> and all the sons הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> likewise of king דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> David נָ֣תְנוּ <S%H5414><s%> pledged יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> able תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> unto Solomon הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיְגַדֵּ֨ל <S%H1431><s%> magnified יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon לְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> exceedingly לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> and bestowed עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and ה֣וֹד <S%H1935><s%> majesty מַלְכ֔וּת <S%H4438><s%> upon him [such] royal אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> had עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> as had not been on any king לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> before עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> him in Israel פ

וְדָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Thus David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשָׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel

וְהַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> And the time אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which מָלַךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> that he reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> [was] forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּחֶבְר֤וֹן <S%H2275><s%> he in Hebron מָלַךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> reigned שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> he in Jerusalem מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> [years] reigned שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וְשָׁלֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H7969><s%> and three

וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <S%H4191><s%> And he died בְּשֵׂיבָ֣ה <S%H7872><s%> old age טוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> in a good שְׂבַ֥ע <S%H7649><s%> full יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> of days עֹ֣שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches וְכָב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <S%H8010><s%> and Solomon בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וְדִבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> Now the acts דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> first וְהָאֲחרֹנִ֑ים <S%H314><s%> and last הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> behold כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> behold they [are] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> in the book שְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel הָרֹאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> the seer וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> and in the book נָתָ֣ן <S%H5416><s%> of Nathan הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and in דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> and in the book גָּ֥ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad הַחֹזֶֽה׃ <S%H2374><s%> the seer

עִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכוּת֖וֹ <S%H4438><s%> With all his reign וּגְבוּרָת֑וֹ <S%H1369><s%> and his might וְהָעִתִּ֗ים <S%H6256><s%> and the times אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> that went over עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> him and over Israel וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> and over all the kingdoms הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> of the countries פ
